existing_features.title: In the Biography component, update the text on line-2 (currently 'Dr. Shane J Charbonnet') to 'The Doctor of UDesign ©sm'. This text appears directly to the right of the photo-image in the context section.

projectName: Update biography line-2 text to 'The Doctor of UDesign ©sm'
